resources.string: "After Peter Parker is bitten by a genetically altered spider, he gains new found, spider-like powers and ventures out to solve the mystery of his parent's mysterious death."

James Vanderbilt (screenplay), Alvin Sargent (screenplay), Steve Kloves (screenplay), James Vanderbilt (story), Stan Lee (based on the Marvel comic book by), Steve Ditko (based on the Marvel comic book by)
